backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: adding two uploaded photos to the gallery and arranging all gallery photos in an organized grid layout.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components, hooks, and configuration for a Valentine's Day single-page website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a romantic color palette and theme tokens for both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tags and a root div for mounting the app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component that renders all sections (hero, love message, gallery, reasons, countdown) with romantic background, audio player, and surprise button.
frontend/src/components/AudioPlayerToggl: Fixed audio player toggle button with mute/unmute functionality and an info popover explaining the royalty-free music substitute and how to replace it.
frontend/src/components/background/Roman: Animated background component rendering falling heart-shaped petals on HTML5 canvas with gradient overlay and background image.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Countdown timer display component showing days, hours, minutes, and seconds until Valentine's Day in a responsive grid with animated hearts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying a love message for Numa Sharma with animated heart icons.
frontend/src/components/gallery/FramedGa: Reusable gallery image component with heart frame overlay, hover scale effects, glow border, and staggered fade-in animation support.
frontend/src/components/sections/Countdo: Section wrapper for the countdown timer with intersection observer for scroll-triggered fade-in animation and romantic card styling.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Displays a grid of 12 gallery images with intersection observer for fade-in animation. Uses FramedGalleryImage component with staggered delays for each image.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with animated heart icons, large cursive name "Numa Sharma", and subtitle "My Forever Valentine". Includes intersection observer for fade-in effect.
frontend/src/components/sections/LoveMes: Displays a romantic love letter in a styled card with serif typography and first-letter drop cap. Uses intersection observer for scroll-triggered animation.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reasons: Accordion component listing 12 reasons for love, each with a heart icon. Uses intersection observer and includes expandable content for each reason.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseButton.t: Large sparkle-decorated button that opens a surprise modal with romantic styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/SurpriseModal.ts: Modal dialog component displaying a special romantic message for Numa Sharma using shadcn Dialog with animated hearts.
frontend/src/constants/audio.ts: Exports audio configuration constants including the background music path, loop setting, and default volume (0.3).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file with no backend queries, as this is a frontend-only application.
frontend/src/hooks/useValentinesCountdow: Custom hook that calculates and returns countdown time (days, hours, minutes, seconds) to next Valentine's Day, updating every second.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with romantic Valentine's Day color palette (blush, rose, champagne), custom glow effects, shadows, and gradient backgrounds for love-themed styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color schemes (including romantic-themed colors using oklch), typography, animations (accordion, float, pulse-glow), container settings, and extended theme properties for a styled UI.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for a Valentine's Day Website tracking two completed features: adding uploaded photos to a gallery and arranging them in a grid layout.
